title: Pool Views, Beautiful Views of the Community, Tennis court
posting_body: ['YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', 'Surrounded by sprawling\xa0green\xa0lawns and mature trees,\xa0Independence\xa0Green\xa0Apartments is your destination for inspired living.', 'Our one-, two-, and three-bedroom apartment homes offer well-appointed interiors complete with a convenient in-home washer and dryer and ample storage space.', ' Our wooded community provides gorgeous views and the perfect backdrop for a quiet glass of wine on your own private patio.', 'If you prefer to work out before you relax, check out our heated indoor pool in the winter, or our sparkling outdoor pool and sand volleyball court in the summer.', '\xa0   Independence\xa0Green\xa0Apartments has everything you need to unwind, get fit, and live well.', 'Come see why life is better at\xa0Independence\xa0Green\xa0Apartments.', 'Amenities Include:', 'Outdoor Pool', 'Upgraded Kitchens', 'Pool Views', 'Fairway Views', 'Outdoor Swimming Pool', 'Beautiful Views of the Community', 'Online Payments Available', 'Heated Indoor Pool', 'Sauna', 'Clubhouse/Fitness Center', 'Private Patio / Balcony', 'Tennis court', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
